overview: On a cold winter night in Cairo, 28-year-old Hazem welcomes men to his father's funeral. While listening to the Qur'an, his mother suddenly arrives, and starts insulting the late father while exposing his extramarital affairs that left her solely responsible for her son & daughter. People are trying to shut her up, she is in a total hysteria. What will Hazem do?
title: He's Dead Now
